metadata.title: USN-4845-1 -- libcgroup vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libcgroup incorrectly handled log file permissions. An attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4845-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libcgroup-dev - 0.41-8ubuntu2+esm1 libpam-cgroup - 0.41-8ubuntu2+esm1 libcgroup1 - 0.41-8ubuntu2+esm1 cgroup-bin - 0.41-8ubuntu2+esm1 cgroup-tools - 0.41-8ubuntu2+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
